name: Dice Merge: Matching Puzzle
description:
Dice Merge is a great game for you to train your brain and challenge yourself. Simply drag and drop the dices into the board to merge them with ones of the same values to increase their values, and get gems in the end. The ultimate goal is to collect as many gems as possible to get high scores. Here is how you can become a merge master with this puzzle game
HOW TO PLAY
- Start with 5x5 grid of puzzle board
- Then, you will get random dices to drag and drop onto the board
- Match 3 or more dices of the same value to get higher-valued dices. When you merge 6-sliced dice, you will get gems in the end. The more gems you collect, the higher your score
- Use booster to improve your scores
FEATURES
Dice Merge expects to bring you a fun and relaxing time with its unique features. Here are some elements of this strategy-first game
- Available offline, no need for Internet connection
- Beautiful 3D graphics, with bright and colorful dices
- Include many boosters
- No time limit, no pressure
- Easy-to-play
- Simple yet challenging mobile game for all
- Keep multiply and merge dices to beat your high scores

If you're looking for a challenging yet entertaining mobile game, Dice Merge can be your match. Let's enjoy this game and have a fun time.
